body.p: This page is generated by Machine Translation from Japanese.

section.name: Search through XML response
section.p: To emit the XML results of Fess. You need to do this output in XML Management screen crawl settings XML response enabled by you.

subsection.name: Request
subsection.p: To get the output XML http://localhost:8080/Fess/XML? query = search terms Of these sends a request. Request parameters are as follows.

tr.td: Search language. Pass the URL encoding.
The number of where to start. Starts at 0.
The number of display. The default is 20. You can display up to 100.
The label value. Use to specify the label.

subsection.name: Responses to
subsection.source:

tr.td: The status of the response. 0, the normal response.
Number of hits for the search term.
Page number of the number of hits for the search term.
Parent element of the search results.
The elements of the search results.
Last update date. 1970 / 01 / 01 milliseconds starting at 00: 00: 00.
Document creation date. 1970 / 01 / 01 milliseconds starting at 00: 00: 00.
The title of the document for viewing.
The URL as the search results.
